title: Why My DIY Website Almost Drove Me Insane - And Why I’d Do It Again
description: F﻿irst, let me start this off by saying, I have zero clue how to blog. I don’t know how I’m supposed to write, how long my posts are supposed to be, if there’s some sort of standards to meet or something, no idea. I’m not a professional blogger.

title: Welcome to My Cybersecurity Blog
description: This is the first post on my brand-new cybersecurity portfolio and blog. Stay tuned for posts about threat detection labs, cloud projects, and security concepts!
